text: Ej musalmonon, in fazli ʙuzurg (saloh va nacot) ro ʙa orzuho sohiʙ suda nametavoned va in na muvofiqi orzui sumost va na muvofiqi orzui ahli kitoʙ, ʙalki ʙa imoni rost va amali neke, ki rizogii Alloh dar on ast, sohiʙ suda metavoned. Va har kas, ki murtakiʙi kori ʙade savad, cazojasro ʙuʙinad va ʙa cuz Alloh hec duste va joridihandae najoʙad
